name: BulletHell Planes (Gijs Westerdijk)
description:
BulletHell Planes is a game about shooting your way through endless waves of enemies in your hyper powered aircraft!

I made this game in 1 month for my game-a-month challenge. You can learn more about the game-a-month challenge here.

This is the first game of this year and I'm very excited to see all the feedback I will get.

Controls

Keyboard and mouse

wasd to move 

mouse buttons to shoot (hold for giant LAZOOOR)

Controller

left stick to move

triggers to shoot

Source code

The source code for this project is available for purchase here.

Special thanks

I would like to give a special thanks to my friends who playtested this game for me and helped me a lot with designing the game.

Jasper Blank - Feature Creep and Playtesting

Tim Wijnberger - Playtesting

Iris "Brasz" Agterberg - Early Playtesting and Playtesting
